sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Header from "./Header"; import Footer from "./Footer"; const Stat = ({ icon, value, label }) => (
{icon}
{value}
{label}
); const AboutPage = () => { return (
{/* Hero Banner with header overlay */}

About Us

For over two decades, British Way English Academy has been shaping futures with trusted language education.

{/* Intro + Gallery + Stats */}

About Us

This is where your dreams of perfecting your English language skills come true. British Way English Academy is the best of its kind to bring the prime standards in English Language Skills training.

The range of courses at British Way ensures customized learning opportunities for every student enrolling with us with 20+ years of experience as well as with the dynamic, professional and qualified team of lecturers.

Annually, the 16 branches of the academy around the country produce over 21,000 Diploma holders who are ready to enter the global environment and the job market with the competency in English and other communication skills.

{/* Stats pill */}
{/* Image collage to match design shapes */}
{/* Main image */} {/* Overlay small image bottom-right */} {/* Top small image */}
{/* Vision & Mission with center divider and ash gradient background */}

Our Vision

To be the most respected provider of English language training in Asia by 2030

We aim to provide world-class English language learning experiences that transform lives, helping learners unlock their full potential in academia and the workplace.

Our Mission

We deliver affordable, high-quality English language courses through innovative, assessment-driven programmes taught by a highly qualified team. We equip our students with valuable life skills, confidence, and global competencies to realize their dreams.

{/* Timeline */}

Story Of British Way

Explore British Way history

{/* Vertical line */}
{/* Timeline items */} {[ { y: "2004", t: "The first British Way branch opened in Nittambuwa. The first class only had 7 students. As they say, from small acorns, mighty oak trees grow." }, { y: "2007", t: "Kiribathgoda branch opened." }, { y: "2009", t: "Negombo branch was established." }, { y: "2011", t: "A busy year! Two branches were opened: Kandy and Nugegoda." }, { y: "2012", t: "British Way went from strength to strength. 3 branches were established: Matara, Galle and Anuradhapura." }, { y: "2013", t: "Gampaha branch was established." }, { y: "2015", t: "Rathnapura branch opened." }, { y: "2016", t: "BWEA won the award for the Best English Academy in the world at UNESCO’s 7th World Scientific Congress in Geneva. Our first MASSCO Award for Best English Academy came this year." }, { y: "2017", t: "This year Thames College joined the BWEA family. Also, we were awarded the SLIM Brand Excellence Award this year. We were awarded the MASSCO Award for the Best English Academy in Sri Lanka for the second time this year." }, { y: "2018", t: "Consecutively for the third year, we were honoured with MASSCO Award for the Best English Academy in Sri Lanka. We set up our new branches in Bandarawela, Kalutara and Polonnaruwa paving the way to thousands of students to enter the knowledge-based community with flying colours." }, { y: "2019", t: "This year too was written in red letter with a lot of awards and international recognition. Three new branches were opened in Kaluthara, Bandarawela and Polonnaruwa. We were awarded the Brand of the Year at SLIM Brand Excellence held in 2019. We received the MASSCO award for the best English Academy in Sri Lanka for the 4th consecutive time." }, { y: "2020", t: "The first International School of British Way International school network was established in Nittambuwa opening thousands of students receive quality education that keep them one step ahead of others." }, ].map((item, i) => (
{/* Text box */}
{i % 2 === 0 ? (

{item.t}

) : (

{item.t}

)}
{/* Year + circle */}
{item.y}
{/* Empty space for alignment */}
))}
{/* Awards */}

Awards and Appreciations

{[ 'abe.png','AEU.png','BC.png','CTH.png','TVEC.png','Lincoln.png','cambridge.png' ].map((name, idx) => (

Recognition {idx+1}

))}
{/* Chairman Message */}
MESSAGE FROM THE CHAIRMAN
{/* Decorative angled lines */}

We, at the British Way English Academy, believe that every student has unlimited potential for growth and personal development. This ability is fully respected and utilized by our highly qualified team who has mastered the art of language teaching.

Dr. GEETHADEWA

CHAIRMAN • BRITISH WAY ENGLISH ACADEMY

{/* CEO Message */}
MESSAGE FROM THE CEO
{/* Decorative angled lines */}

We deliver affordable, high-quality English language courses through innovative, assessment-driven programmes taught by a highly qualified team. We train our students in interviews, leadership and public speech, ensuring success to realize their dreams.

Mr. Ranga Ilandara

CEO • BRITISH WAY ENGLISH ACADEMY

); }; export default AboutPage;
